title: Game of Thrones, Lauren London, Wendy Williams, Golf Talk and more.
itunes:title: Game of Thrones, Lauren London, Wendy Williams, Golf Talk and more.
description:
Great Friday today opens up with NBA Talk.  Game of Thrones Season 8, nuff said.  Wendy Williams has finally filed for divorce and served her husband on the job.  Nipsey Hussle's Memorial Service was held Thursday and Stevie Wonder spoke about gun control.  Nipsey's longtime girlfriend Lauren London spoke as well.  Trump's last 6 years of tax returns are being discussed.  In the golf world, the Masters Tournament has begun and Tiger Woods is the most discussed player.  Today in Closing Remarks, Big Dog warns us about excuses and more.  Have a great weekend!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
